metadata.title: CVE-2021-38004 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to95.0.4638.69 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
